name: SaBaBa's
address: Whiskey Point, Arugam Bay, Eastern Province
description: SaBaBa's is basically the only place on Whiskey Point. It's run by Mambo's brother and is pretty chill. It's underground (no website/Facebook/etc), but if you show up they'll serve you.
tip: Try to get one of the day beds on the beach. Great place to read.
